name: reformed-churches-locator
description: The most up-to-date directory of Reformed churches worldwide.

scripts.Problem: How to proxy two servers at different URLs:  /hoodie and /
scripts.Solution: Apparently we don't need polymer serve!  We can just serve the app via the hoodie command
scripts.start-bak: save polymer serve command he: (hoodie --adminPassword=rcl --public=app --port=8081) & (echo 'first' && date && polymer serve --port 8080) & echo 'second' && date && browser-sync start --config bs-config.js
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.start-production: npm install -g pm2@latest && pm2 updatePM2 && pm2 restart rcl_start
